entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
